mapper.select: select prod_id, prod_status, prod_content, prod_day, prod_start, prod_end, prod_cs, prod_price, mem_id, company_id from prod
select substr(prod_day, 4, 2) as prod_month, sum(prod_price) as prod_sum from prod where ('20'||substr(prod_day,0,2)) = #{year} and prod_cs = 1 group by substr(prod_day,4,2) order by 1
